spamclustering.mailIo package¶

Submodules¶

spamclustering.mailIo.mailIo module¶

spamclustering.mailIo.mailIo.readMailFromEmlFile(path)¶

Return an EmailMessage object obtained from a file.

Parameters:

path (str) – Path to a eml file to read.

Returns:

Message generated from the file.

Return type:

email.message.Message

spamclustering.mailIo.mailIo.writeMessageToEml(message, fn)¶

Use email.generator.Generator to write the given message to the respective path. :params message: Message to write to the path. :type message: email.message.Message :params fn: Path to write the message to. Must be a legit path. :type fn: str
